00062 static int cache_break_test(void *UNUSED(cbd))
00063 {
00064     return G.afbreek==1;
00065 }
00066 static int ptcache_bake_all_poll(bContext *C)
00067 {
00068     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00069 
00070     if (!scene)
00071         return 0;
00072     
00073     return 1;
00074 }
00075 
00076 static int ptcache_poll(bContext *C)
00077 {
00078     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "point_cache", &RNA_PointCache);
00079     return (ptr.data && ptr.id.data);
00080 }

00082 static void bake_console_progress(void *UNUSED(arg), int nr)
00083 {
00084     printf("\rbake: %3i%%", nr);
00085     fflush(stdout);
00086 }
00087 
00088 static void bake_console_progress_end(void *UNUSED(arg))
00089 {
00090     printf("\rbake: done!\n");
00091 }

00093 static int ptcache_bake_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00094 {
00095     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00096     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00097     wmWindow *win = G.background ? NULL : CTX_wm_window(C);
00098     PTCacheBaker baker;
00099 
00100     baker.main = bmain;
00101     baker.scene = scene;
00102     baker.pid = NULL;
00103     baker.bake = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "bake");
00104     baker.render = 0;
00105     baker.anim_init = 0;
00106     baker.quick_step = 1;
00107     baker.break_test = cache_break_test;
00108     baker.break_data = NULL;
00109 
00110     /* Disabled for now as this doesn't work properly,
00111      * and pointcache baking will be reimplemented with
00112      * the job system soon anyways. */
00113     if (win) {
00114         baker.progressbar = (void (*)(void *, int))WM_timecursor;
00115         baker.progressend = (void (*)(void *))WM_cursor_restore;
00116         baker.progresscontext = win;
00117     }
00118     else {
00119         baker.progressbar = bake_console_progress;
00120         baker.progressend = bake_console_progress_end;
00121         baker.progresscontext = NULL;
00122     }
00123 
00124     BKE_ptcache_bake(&baker);
00125 
00126     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, scene);
00127     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POINTCACHE, NULL);
00128 
00129     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00130 }
00131 static int ptcache_free_bake_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00132 {
00133     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00134     Base *base;
00135     PTCacheID *pid;
00136     ListBase pidlist;
00137 
00138     for (base=scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
00139         BKE_ptcache_ids_from_object(&pidlist, base->object, scene, MAX_DUPLI_RECUR);
00140 
00141         for (pid=pidlist.first; pid; pid=pid->next) {
00142             pid->cache->flag &= ~PTCACHE_BAKED;
00143         }
00144         
00145         BLI_freelistN(&pidlist);
00146         
00147         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POINTCACHE, base->object);
00148     }
00149 
00150     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, scene);
00151 
00152     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00153 }

00155 void PTCACHE_OT_bake_all(wmOperatorType *ot)
00156 {
00157     /* identifiers */
00158     ot->name = "Bake All Physics";
00159     ot->description = "Bake all physics";
00160     ot->idname = "PTCACHE_OT_bake_all";
00161     
00162     /* api callbacks */
00163     ot->exec = ptcache_bake_all_exec;
00164     ot->poll = ptcache_bake_all_poll;
00165 
00166     /* flags */
00167     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00168 
00169     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "bake", 1, "Bake", "");
00170 }
00171 void PTCACHE_OT_free_bake_all(wmOperatorType *ot)
00172 {
00173     /* identifiers */
00174     ot->name = "Free All Physics Bakes";
00175     ot->idname = "PTCACHE_OT_free_bake_all";
00176     
00177     /* api callbacks */
00178     ot->exec = ptcache_free_bake_all_exec;
00179     ot->poll = ptcache_bake_all_poll;
00180 
00181     /* flags */
00182     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00183 }
00184 static int ptcache_bake_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00185 {
00186     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00187     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00188     wmWindow *win = G.background ? NULL : CTX_wm_window(C);
00189     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "point_cache", &RNA_PointCache);
00190     Object *ob= ptr.id.data;
00191     PointCache *cache= ptr.data;
00192     PTCacheBaker baker;
00193     PTCacheID *pid;
00194     ListBase pidlist;
00195 
00196     BKE_ptcache_ids_from_object(&pidlist, ob, scene, MAX_DUPLI_RECUR);
00197     
00198     for (pid=pidlist.first; pid; pid=pid->next) {
00199         if (pid->cache == cache)
00200             break;
00201     }
00202 
00203     baker.main = bmain;
00204     baker.scene = scene;
00205     baker.pid = pid;
00206     baker.bake = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "bake");
00207     baker.render = 0;
00208     baker.anim_init = 0;
00209     baker.quick_step = 1;
00210     baker.break_test = cache_break_test;
00211     baker.break_data = NULL;
00212 
00213     /* Disabled for now as this doesn't work properly,
00214      * and pointcache baking will be reimplemented with
00215      * the job system soon anyways. */
00216     if (win) {
00217         baker.progressbar = (void (*)(void *, int))WM_timecursor;
00218         baker.progressend = (void (*)(void *))WM_cursor_restore;
00219         baker.progresscontext = win;
00220     }
00221     else {
00222         printf("\n"); /* empty first line before console reports */
00223         baker.progressbar = bake_console_progress;
00224         baker.progressend = bake_console_progress_end;
00225         baker.progresscontext = NULL;
00226     }
00227 
00228     BKE_ptcache_bake(&baker);
00229 
00230     BLI_freelistN(&pidlist);
00231 
00232     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, scene);
00233     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POINTCACHE, ob);
00234 
00235     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00236 }
00237 static int ptcache_free_bake_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00238 {
00239     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "point_cache", &RNA_PointCache);
00240     PointCache *cache= ptr.data;
00241     Object *ob= ptr.id.data;
00242 
00243     if (cache->edit) {
00244         if (!cache->edit->edited || 1) {// XXX okee("Lose changes done in particle mode?")) {
00245             PE_free_ptcache_edit(cache->edit);
00246             cache->edit = NULL;
00247             cache->flag &= ~PTCACHE_BAKED;
00248         }
00249     }
00250     else
00251         cache->flag &= ~PTCACHE_BAKED;
00252     
00253     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POINTCACHE, ob);
00254 
00255     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00256 }
00257 static int ptcache_bake_from_cache_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00258 {
00259     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "point_cache", &RNA_PointCache);
00260     PointCache *cache= ptr.data;
00261     Object *ob= ptr.id.data;
00262     
00263     cache->flag |= PTCACHE_BAKED;
00264     
00265     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POINTCACHE, ob);
00266 
00267     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00268 }

00314 static int ptcache_add_new_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00315 {
00316     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00317     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "point_cache", &RNA_PointCache);
00318     Object *ob= ptr.id.data;
00319     PointCache *cache= ptr.data;
00320     PTCacheID *pid;
00321     ListBase pidlist;
00322 
00323     BKE_ptcache_ids_from_object(&pidlist, ob, scene, MAX_DUPLI_RECUR);
00324     
00325     for (pid=pidlist.first; pid; pid=pid->next) {
00326         if (pid->cache == cache) {
00327             PointCache *cache = BKE_ptcache_add(pid->ptcaches);
00328             cache->step = pid->default_step;
00329             *(pid->cache_ptr) = cache;
00330             break;
00331         }
00332     }
00333 
00334     BLI_freelistN(&pidlist);
00335 
00336     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, scene);
00337     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POINTCACHE, ob);
00338 
00339     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00340 }
00341 static int ptcache_remove_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00342 {
00343     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "point_cache", &RNA_PointCache);
00344     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00345     Object *ob= ptr.id.data;
00346     PointCache *cache= ptr.data;
00347     PTCacheID *pid;
00348     ListBase pidlist;
00349 
00350     BKE_ptcache_ids_from_object(&pidlist, ob, scene, MAX_DUPLI_RECUR);
00351     
00352     for (pid=pidlist.first; pid; pid=pid->next) {
00353         if (pid->cache == cache) {
00354             if (pid->ptcaches->first == pid->ptcaches->last)
00355                 continue; /* don't delete last cache */
00356 
00357             BLI_remlink(pid->ptcaches, pid->cache);
00358             BKE_ptcache_free(pid->cache);
00359             *(pid->cache_ptr) = pid->ptcaches->first;
00360 
00361             break;
00362         }
00363     }
00364 
00365     BLI_freelistN(&pidlist);
00366     
00367     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POINTCACHE, ob);
00368 
00369     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00370 }
00371 void PTCACHE_OT_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00372 {
00373     /* identifiers */
00374     ot->name = "Add New Cache";
00375     ot->description = "Add new cache";
00376     ot->idname = "PTCACHE_OT_add";
00377     
00378     /* api callbacks */
00379     ot->exec = ptcache_add_new_exec;
00380     ot->poll = ptcache_poll; // ptcache_bake_all_poll;
00381 
00382     /* flags */
00383     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00384 }
00385 void PTCACHE_OT_remove(wmOperatorType *ot)
00386 {
00387     /* identifiers */
00388     ot->name = "Delete Current Cache";
00389     ot->description = "Delete current cache";
00390     ot->idname = "PTCACHE_OT_remove";
00391     
00392     /* api callbacks */
00393     ot->exec = ptcache_remove_exec;
00394     ot->poll = ptcache_poll;
00395 
00396     /* flags */
00397     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00398 }
